name: Beepo City
description:
You play as a despondent Beepo returning to their home city after a routine maintenance check only to find it ravaged by mysterious missile toting turrets! Destroy as many of them as you can before they send you off to your next repair!

This is my first finished and released game done during a personal little game jam challenge over the course of one weekend! I've uploaded it with all it's jank in tact to keep the spirit of an official game jam (hopefully you can bear through it!) Check the READ_ME in the zip file for controls and a known list of bugs, and thank you so much for taking the time to try my game!

Special thanks to Kerrie Lake for her beautiful color palette, my buddy Wes for the awesome title card, and Shaun Spalding for getting me started with GameMaker and game development with his brilliant tutorials!
